definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally

sentences.english: The second is that a systematic error exists, resulting from the attrition voltage and contact electric potential difference.
sentences.chinese: 存在一個由消耗電壓與接觸電勢差導致的系統誤差。

sentences.english: Desalting of crude oil consumes huge quantity of fresh water.
sentences.chinese: 原油脫鹽要消耗大量的新鮮水。

sentences.english: Fig1. Paper is staple food supposing office is restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 如果辦公室是個餐館，紙應該是每天消耗最多的主食。

sentences.english: To reduce memory usage, start by identifying the largest consumers of memory.
sentences.chinese: 爲了減少內存消耗，先要找出內存的消耗大戶。

sentences.english: To reduce memory usage, start by identifying the largest consumers of memory.
sentences.chinese: 爲了減少內存消耗，先要找出內存的消耗大戶。

sentences.english: Among grains, only rice is consumed in great quantities than wheat. (Todd Korol/Reuters)
sentences.chinese: 在所有穀物裏，僅有大米的消耗量比小麥多。

sentences.english: A smaller vehicle will consume less fuel.
sentences.chinese: 更小的汽車消耗更少的油。
即使有30%的消耗？也還有20萬人。

sentences.english: But both Apple and Google have plenty of financial muscle to prolong the fight.
sentences.chinese: 但是，蘋果和谷歌兩家公司財力雄厚，足以打消耗戰。

sentences.english: Power consumption is controlled by management software.
sentences.chinese: 能源消耗由管理軟件控制。

sentences.english: but some of that cost is due to being hard-real-time and not just the read-barrier per-se.
sentences.chinese: 但是，一些消耗在於硬實時和不僅僅是讀操作屏障。

sentences.english: Many top athletes can consume up to twice what a normal preson would eat.
sentences.chinese: 許多頂尖運動員消耗掉的食物是正常所喫食物的兩倍。

sentences.english: America is weaning itself off imported energy at breakneck speed.
sentences.chinese: 美國正在以非常危險的速度消耗自己重要的能源。

sentences.english: Slagging capacity of regenerator has direct influences on the quality of circulating wash oil and consumption of wash oil.
sentences.chinese: 再生器造渣能力直接關係到循環洗油質量和洗油消耗。

sentences.english: Each day the local market consumes between three and six tonnes of its yoghurt.
sentences.chinese: 當地市場每天消耗三至六噸該公司生產的酸乳酪。

sentences.english: The catalytic reactors have the functions of pre-drying, deoxigenation and sorbent regeneration, and are simple in structure, safe in operation and energy saving.
sentences.chinese: 它具有結構簡單，使用安全可靠，不消耗能源等優點。

definition: to exhaust/to use up/to deplete/to drain
